title: Ranked Team is looking for adc/supp/jungle and top
body:
Hello guys,

i wanna create my own ranked team for this season and for that i need your help. As you can see on the topic that im looking for each role except mid because i will be the mid laner.

Elo ist not very important but not unimportant neither. You should be between Gold III and Diamond V. Age over 16 (pls) and you should be able to use skype that includes headset etc. .

You can introduce yourself (Age, IGN, Lane, Champs, Elo etc.) here in the forum or you can me add in the game " Darth Malgus " .

replies.body:
Age: 15
Lane: ADC
Champs: {{champion:429}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:67}} 
ELO: Gold 3
